name: Øresundsbro Konsortiet
goal:
Our vision is to establish the Oresundsregion as a powerful center, where it is attractive to live, to work and to visit.

According to our business concept the Øresund Bridge shall, on a daily basis, build new bridges – economic, cultural and spiritual bridges.

The Øresund Bridge shall be the best way to the destination on the other side.

With the target to pay back the loans in 30 years.
euInitiatives:
We cover activities in the following initiatives:
PRIME
TEN-T
Eurovignette
